hcoopmeetbotlogic.dateutil
==========================

.. py:module:: hcoopmeetbotlogic.dateutil

.. autoapi-nested-parse::

   Date utilities.





Module Contents
---------------

.. py:function:: now() -> datetime.datetime

   Get the current time in UTC


.. py:function:: formatdate(timestamp: datetime.datetime | None, zone: str = 'UTC', fmt: str = '%Y-%m-%dT%H:%M%z') -> str

   Format a datetime for display in a specific time zone.
